parameter.name: axis
parameter.help: Axis may be "x" or "y", controls the orientation and default scrollattr, default: "y"

parameter.name: scrollable
parameter.help: True if the scrolltarget is bigger than the containing view therefore the scrollbar is active. The scrollbar appears disabled when scrollable is false. You can make the scrollbar invisible when there is nothing to scroll by setting visible="${scrollable}"

parameter.name: scrollattr
parameter.help: The attribute of the scrolltarget that is modified by the scrollbar, default: value of axis attribute.

parameter.name: scrollmax
parameter.help: The maximum distance to scroll, default: the height or width of the scrolltarget.

parameter.name: scrolltarget
parameter.help: The view that is controlled by the scrollbar.

parameter.name: stepsize
parameter.help: The amount that the scrolltarget is moved when the user clicks on the scrolltrack or when the step method is called, default: 10.
